Articles.Content:
I'm going to send a MAV on Mars almost empty (with just the right amount of Hydrolox fuel to land) and then refuel it trough RealISRU (sadly still not completed, but it works).I need help with methods to extract the fuel from the surface/atmosphere , chemical conversions and some math with it.

Landing config:

Mars takeoff config:

I have 15 months to produce all that fuel.(around 85 tons)
